param.name: scayt_maxSuggestions
param.label: Maximum Suggestions
param.description: Defines the number of SCAYT suggestions to show in the main context menu. The possible values are: * 0 (zero): All suggestions are displayed in the main context menu. * Positive number: The maximum number of suggestions to shown in context menu. Other entries will be shown in 'More Suggestions' sub-menu. * Negative number: No suggestions are shown in the main context menu. All entries will be listed in the 'Suggestions' sub-menu.
